label: 椎
本: A Tale of Flowering Fortunes:  Annals of Japanese Aristocratic Life in the Heian Period (Volumes One and Two) . Stanford University Press . 1980
説明文: A term referred to genera of the beech family [Fagaceae], usually to varieties of the Catanopsis cuspidata, a relative of the California and Oregon chinquapin, but sometimes also to Lithocarpus edulis and L. glabra, close realtives of the oak. (p. 96)
